title: Analysing metabarcoding data with dada2
text:
From the sequencing platform
Two files (R1 and R2) per sequencing run or per sample

R1 (60 first base pairs):

    @M05074:31:000000000-BC3R3:1:1101:13622:1477 1:N:0:1
